passives.name: Energized
passives.effects: Moving and basic attacking generates ''Energize'' stacks, up to 100.

passives.name: Galvanize
passives.effects: {{tip|Energized}} stack generation is increased by 75% for distance travelled from {{tip|dash|dashes}}, {{tip|lunge|lunges}} and {{tip|blink|blinks}}, as well as while moving in {{tip|stealth}}.

passives.name: Firmament
passives.effects: When fully {{tip|Energized}}, your next basic attack deals {{as|100 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by {{rd|99%|20%}} for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.

effects_structured.raw: Moving and basic attacking generates ''Energize'' stacks, up to 100.
{{tip Energized}} stack generation is increased by 75% for distance travelled from {{tip dash dashes}}, {{tip lunge lunges}} and {{tip blink blinks}}, as well as while moving in {{tip stealth}}.
When fully {{tip Energized}}, your next basic attack deals {{as 100 '''bonus''' physical damage}} [[on-hit]] and {{tip slow slows}} the target by {{rd 99% 20%}} for {{fd 0.75}} seconds.
